title: New arts
creator_credit: Eric Saarinen, Howard Chesley and Pyramid Films
brief_description: Surveys the creations and thoughts of eight artists whose work combines art and technology and shows the installations of some of these art works. Refers to Boyd Mefferd, Claes Oldenberg, Newton Harrison, Robert Whitman, Roy Lichtenstein, Andy Warhol, Tony Smith, and Rockne Krebs.
